game.title: Game Title
game.synopsis: Once upon a time, in a world filled with magic and adventure, a young hero sets out on a quest to save their kingdom from an ancient evil.
game.beginning: In a small village, the hero awakens to a prophetic dream, revealing their purpose. Guided by an old wise sage, the hero obtains a magical weapon and embarks on their epic journey.
game.ending: After countless trials and battles, the hero confronts the ancient evil in a final showdown. With the help of their loyal allies, they manage to overcome the villain and restore harmony to the kingdom. The hero is hailed as a savior, and their name is etched in the annals of history.
